header.title: Python Programming
header.description: Master the art of Python development. Python is a versatile, easy-to-learn, and powerful programming language used in web development, data science, machine learning, and more. This course will equip you with the skills to create efficient and scalable applications using Python's extensive libraries and frameworks.

overview: Embark on a journey to learn Python programming from scratch. This comprehensive course will guide you through core programming concepts, advanced topics, and real-world applications. By the end of this course, you'll be proficient in Python and ready to tackle a variety of development challenges.
whatYouWillLearn: Core Python syntax and data structures
Web development with Flask and Django
Data analysis with Pandas and NumPy

outline.title: Python Fundamentals
outline.subTitle1Content: Learn Python syntax, variables, and data types including strings, lists, tuples, and dictionaries.
outline.subTitle2Content: Understand conditional statements, loops, and writing reusable functions.

outline.title: Object-Oriented Programming
outline.subTitle1Content: Learn to create classes and objects for structured and efficient code.
outline.subTitle2Content: Master advanced OOP concepts for code reusability and flexibility.

outline.title: Web Development with Python
outline.subTitle1Content: Build your first web application using Flask.
outline.subTitle2Content: Develop scalable web applications with Django's powerful tools.

outline.title: Data Analysis
outline.subTitle1Content: Perform data manipulation and analysis using Pandas and NumPy libraries.
outline.subTitle2Content: Create meaningful visualizations using Matplotlib and Seaborn.

outline.title: APIs and Deployment
outline.subTitle1Content: Learn to create and test RESTful APIs using FastAPI.
outline.subTitle2Content: Deploy Python applications on cloud platforms like AWS or Heroku.

outline.title: Capstone Project
outline.subTitle1Content: Define and design your final project.
outline.subTitle2Content: Build, test, and present your fully-functional Python application.
